thread.title: Free Credit Freezes Coming for All U.S. Consumers

author: Lalita Clozel
title: Free Credit Freezes Coming for All U.S. Consumers
text:
WASHINGTON—Consumers are on track to get one thing from Congress in response to last year’s massive Equifax Inc. hack: free freezes of their data held by the credit-reporting companies.
The bipartisan agreement, set to be approved in the Senate by next week as part of a broader banking bill, would require credit-reporting companies to let consumers block access to their credit reports to potential lenders without paying a fee. Freezing access to credit data is a crucial measure consumers can take if they want to protect themselves... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
